title: LTB or Trade For S74 silks with paper backs
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: LTB or Trade For S74 silks with paper backs
posts.post_content: Loooking to buy or trade for nice examples of S74 silks with paper ad backs. I have most of the set and am hoping someone has some that I need . Feel free to email me with any offers or silks you may have
